amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish the Biosafety Research Program by authorizing $35 million for support of fundamental research in areas related to assessing biosafety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish the Biosafety Research program by authorizing $35 million for support of fundamental research in areas related to assessing biosafety.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 259 (Roll no. 211).
